name: KatAttak!
description: Now sit the Frick down and watch a trashy prototype of a game that will soon be a major, pixelated, garbage hit: KatAttak! Shoot the dogs and collect the apples! Soon you will be able to play a game that is the same as this game, but with a carbon-based human that is your friend! (sorry, no further description, I'm lazy and I don't want to hire writers.)
